entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
